text.text_translated:
Suzanne Collins does not like news about wars. She thinks it is very sad.

When she was a child, her father was a pilot. He was in the US Air Force. He fought in a war in Vietnam.

Her mother wanted to keep her safe. So, her mother did not tell her about the war. But Suzanne still saw the news on TV. She knew her dad was there. This was a very scary time for her.
